ref.mixed-citation: Wan S, Yi Q, Fan S, Lv J, Zhang X, Guo L, et al. Characteristics of lymphocyte subsets and cytokines in peripheral blood of 123 hospitalized patients with 2019 novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). medRxiv. Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Press; 2020;2020.02.10.20021832 This article summarized peripheral blood lymphocyte subpopulations and cytokine levels in COVID-19 hospitalized patients. This article clearly describes what a cytokine storm is about.
